description: This dataset includes ridership for the eight transportation subsidiaries managed by the Rochester Genesee Regional Transportation Authority. Ridership includes the total number of riders, passengers or boardings.

name: Rochester-Genesee Regional Transportation Authority (RGRTA) Rider Volumes:  Beginning 2006
